page.title: 12Culmstock Village Activities
page.content: The people of Culmstock benefit from many varied clubs and organisations. The three local churches, Anglican, Methodist and Baptist hold regular Services with Sunday Schools for the children. The women of the village are catered for by meetings of the Mother's Union at the Parish Church,the Culmstock Women's Institute and the Wives Club. Senior Citizens meet at the Over Sixties Club The children's activities include Mothers and Toddlers,Playgroup and Brownies. Sporting activities include thriving football ,cricket, pub skittle and darts teams. An annual flower show is organised by the Cottage Garden and Floral Society.
